    Cycle through elements of a netlet object and make sure that they are identical before we try to merge into a multilayer netify object

    Converts a dyadic data into a network in various formats

    Longitudinal variants of get_adjacency() which returns a three-dimensional array

    Longitudinal variants of get_adjacency() which returns a list of adjacency matrices
    get_attribs()
    Helper function for layer_netify to extract attributes from listed netlet objects

    reduce_combine_dyad_attr()
    Reduce and combine multiple dyadic attributes of netify objects into a single dyadic attribute. Mainly for use within the layer_netify function
    reduce_combine_nodal_attr()
    Reduce and combine multiple nodal attributes of netify objects into a single nodal attribute. Mainly for use within the layer_netify function
